act:
1364324 THE SUGARCANE CESS (VALIDATION) REPEAL ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 35 OF 2001 [ 3rd September, 2001.]
An Act to repeal the Sugarcane Cess (Validation) Act, 1961.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
501608 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Sugarcane Cess (Validation) Repeal Act, 2001.
73961 2Repeal of Act 38 of 1961.- The Sugarcane Cess (Validation) Act, 1961 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
